job_history.work_description: Provide Administrative support to the Finance Unit and maintain orderly filing system for various departmental units. Oversee and maintain the proper and appropriate systems for storing financial records and documents utilized by finance unit. Assist Contracts and Accounts Payable department with clerical duties such as faxing, filing, copying and scanning and assisting with the creation and editing of documents, spreadsheets or PowerPoint presentations.

Assisted the Human Resources department. Assisted the HR Liaison with collecting various forms (EPRS, GIC, retirement, among others), couriering important documents to various state agencies, and helping create and fill out any necessary forms. Maintained strictly confidential information and file HR Documents.
Prepared written reports for complaints and incidents that occurred during an event. Provided Customer service. Ensured the safety of fans and the TD Garden property.

skills.name: Administrative Support
skills.explanation: Provided administrative support to the Finance Unit and maintained orderly filing system for various departmental units, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Record Keeping
skills.explanation: Maintained proper and appropriate systems for storing financial records and documents, and also maintained strictly confidential information and file HR Documents, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided customer service as a Security Officer, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Assisted with the creation and editing of documents, spreadsheets or PowerPoint presentations, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Handled multiple tasks and responsibilities in different roles, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Created written reports for complaints and incidents, and also assisted with filling out forms, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Studied Business Management Accounting, but there is no direct work experience mentioned, indicating basic familiarity.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Used Microsoft Office for creating and editing documents, spreadsheets or PowerPoint presentations, suggesting some practical experience.
